name: I've Got You, Son
description:
There is nothing more powerful than the love of a Father for his Son. Experience a spooky dungeon crawling adventure where Dominic Carpenter ventures into the depths of his son Eli's mind to rescue him from his demons. What started off as a wake-up call for a school day quickly turns into a battle for survival.

Move with WASD Attack with mouse Yes, the dungeon is randomized!

This game was created for the Global Game Jam of 2021. Was developed under 48 hours.
